introduction.para: Below you can find notes about each supported database engine

list.listItem: Ndb works with InnoDB tables engine (since it has foreign keys constraints)
By default Ndb sets ConvertZeroDateTime=true, if you don't want so, please specify your own value in the connection string
Database and column names in database are lowercased
There are no unsigned types in PostgreSQL so you will have an exception if you use one of them.
SqLite doesn't have foreign keys functionality therefore Ndb emulate them by generating triggers
Besides poor ALTER TABLE support by SqLite, Ndb can't update it's tables now
